remarks.para: May be inoperative provided alternate procedures are established and used.

numlitem.para: Place associated selector switch in voice mode.
If Datalink is not available in both HF and SATCOM modes, complete Flight Data coupon as described in FOM, Chapter 3 on each leg, and submit white copy to Operations personnel at arrival gateway.

note.para: Any mode which is operative may be used.

placard.para: Placard near HF Control Panel "L(R) HF DATALINK INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
